Message:
That was one of many
messages in this bundle
of letters.

What started off
as only one letter
quickly grew as I went
from battlefield to battlefield.

“There’s one letter for
each life you’ve saved.”

Hearing those words,
Artie broke down in tears.
I saw how tiny her back was.

It was so fragile and gentle.
No one would believe
she’d tried to bear
the weight of other people’s
lives on it.

Just like a sword
has a sheath,
a sharp blade needs
something to protect it.

From this point on,
I’ll help bear
the weight you carry.

I held my hand out to Artie,
and this time,
she firmly took hold of it.

Since then, I became
Artie’s personal merchant,

and the two of us
set up shop together.

Come to think of it,
that was the beginning.

The beginning of
the unstoppable duo—
the genius blacksmith and
the invincible merchant!
